Package org.training.foodorderapplication.controller

package org.training.foodorderapplication.controller
This package contains controller classes for the Food Order Application. The classes provide RESTful API endpoints for various functions of the application, such as authentication, menu management, user registration, order management, and admin functions.

The package contains the following classes:

AdminController - provides endpoints for managing the restaurant's admin functions, such as adding or removing menu items, updating order status, etc.

AuthenticationController - provides endpoints for authentication, such as logging in and logging out.

MenuController - provides endpoints for managing the restaurant's menu, such as adding or removing menu items, updating menu item details, etc.

RegistrationController - provides endpoints for managing user registration and account information, such as creating new accounts, updating account information, etc.

UserController - provides endpoints for managing user orders, such as creating new orders, updating order status, etc.

By using these controller classes, the application is able to provide a RESTful API for users and staff to interact with the system and perform various tasks related to the Food Order Application.
